cubature 2.0.2

Default arguments for each integration method

default_args.Rd

Since each method has a different set of parameters, this function returns the default values of all parameters that can be modified and passed to integration routines.

default_args()

Value

a named list of parameters for each method.

Examples

default_args()
#> $hcubature
#> $hcubature$norm
#> [1] "INDIVIDUAL" "PAIRED"     "L2"         "L1"         "LINF"      
#> 
#> 
#> $pcubature
#> $pcubature$norm
#> [1] "INDIVIDUAL" "PAIRED"     "L2"         "L1"         "LINF"      
#> 
#> 
#> $cuhre
#> $cuhre$minEval
#> [1] 0
#> 
#> $cuhre$stateFile
#> NULL
#> 
#> $cuhre$flags
#> $cuhre$flags$verbose
#> [1] 0
#> 
#> $cuhre$flags$final
#> [1] 1
#> 
#> $cuhre$flags$smooth
#> [1] 0
#> 
#> $cuhre$flags$keep_state
#> [1] 0
#> 
#> $cuhre$flags$load_state
#> [1] 0
#> 
#> $cuhre$flags$level
#> [1] 0
#> 
#> 
#> $cuhre$key
#> [1] 0
#>
